headline.main: DE GAULLISTS TAKE ISLAND OF REUNION; Fighting French Announce Surrender Without Loss of Life to Either Side CHEERS GREETED ATTACK One of Vichy's Last Outposts, Colony Was Captured by Purely Gallic Force

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 30 -- The French National Committee announced today that the island of Reunion, 350 miles east of Madagascar, in the Indian Ocean, had capitulated without the loss of life to a Fighting French expedition. It was the last island in the French Empire that was under Vichy control.
abstract: Fighting French take Reunion Is bloodlessly; welcomed by pub; Gov P E J Aubert taken prisoner at own request
